thread.title: Rihanna’s Niece Got Into Her Eyeliner and the Results Are Adorable
thread.title_full: Rihanna’s Niece Got Into Her Eyeliner and the Results Are Adorable

title: Rihanna’s Niece Got Into Her Eyeliner and the Results Are Adorable
text: Rihanna and her niece Majesty at the 2015 Diamond Ball. (Photo: Getty Images) More Rihanna consistently slays the fashion and beauty world, and it looks like she’s been passing on her love for glamour to her niece Majesty. The “Anti” singer has previously shared photos of her bathing Majesty and painting her nails , and it seems Auntie Ri’s beauty tips have turned her niece into a bona fide diva. Wednesday, Rihanna shared a hilarious photo to Instagram showing just how much her tutelage has rubbed off on her niece. In the shot, we see Majesty’s partially obscured face covered in black eyeliner. The tyke particularly focused on the eyebrow area, filling in her baby brows with the black eyeliner, serving that pencil-thin look popular in the ’90s. “When everybody asleep. And you been had plans for that liquid liner,” Rihanna captioned the image. Hey, she might not be an expert yet, but it’s clear little Miss Majesty is picking up some basics about applying makeup … sort of. Either way, this eyeliner look is going on our inspiration boards, so that when thin, harsh brows trend come back in style, we’ll have proof that Majesty was the one to bring them back.
